filters.label: DNS-TXT-IQ/CN/RU/RO/UA
filters.query: dns.rrtype:TXT AND (geoip.country_code2:IQ OR geoip.country_code2:RO OR geoip.country_code2:RU OR geoip.country_code2:CN OR geoip.country_code2:IQ geoip.country_code2:UA)

filters.label: HTTP-statcode-0-IQ/CN/RU/RO/UA
filters.query: http.status:0 AND (geoip.country_code2:IQ OR geoip.country_code2:RO OR geoip.country_code2:RU OR geoip.country_code2:CN OR geoip.country_code2:IQ geoip.country_code2:UA)
